Package gdi.game.dominion

Class GradientMap

java.lang.Object
gdi.game.map.Map
gdi.game.map.ArrayMap
gdi.game.map.IsometricMap
gdi.game.dominion.GradientMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
gdi.game.DrawableObject, gdi.game.UpdatableObject, Iterable<MapTile>
public class GradientMap extends gdi.game.map.IsometricMap
An Extension to an IsometricMap that draws a greenish gradient background with a default isometric map setup. By Default the Tiles are represented using NiceTile-Objects
Version:
1.0
Author:
frank

  • Constructor Details

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(gdi.game.map.MapDataProviderInterface data, double scale)
      Creates a new map using the passed MapDataProviderInterface as the backing storage. The number of rows and columns is automatically read from the data provider.
      Parameters:
      data - The data provider for this map.
      scale - The scale of a single tile. This parameter directly influences the size of a map cell.

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(int cols, int rows, double scale)
      Creates a new map with the given number of columns and rows
      Parameters:
      cols - Number of columns for this Map
      rows - Number of rows for this Map
      scale - The scale of a single tile. This parameter directly influences the size of a map cell.

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(int cols, int rows, double scale, Class<? extends MapTile> mapTile)
      Creates a new map with the given number of columns and rows
      Parameters:
      cols - Number of columns for this Map
      rows - Number of rows for this Map
      scale - The scale of a single tile. This parameter directly influences the size of a map cell.
      mapTile - The map tile used to be rendered

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(gdi.game.map.MapDataProviderInterface data)
      Creates a new map using the passed MapDataProviderInterface as the backing storage. The scale GradientMap(MapDataProviderInterface, double) is set to 0.5. The number of rows and columns is automatically read from the data provider.
      Parameters:
      data - The data provider for this map.

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(int cols, int rows)
      Creates a new map with the given number of columns and rows. The scale GradientMap(int, int, double) is set to 0.5
      Parameters:
      cols - Number of columns for this Map
      rows - Number of rows for this Map

    • GradientMap

      public GradientMap(int cols, int rows, Class<? extends MapTile> mapTile)
      Creates a new map with the given number of columns and rows. The scale GradientMap(int, int, double) is set to 0.5
      Parameters:
      cols - Number of columns for this Map
      rows - Number of rows for this Map
      mapTile - The map tile used to be rendered

  • Method Details

    • setGradient

      public void setGradient(Color topColor, Color bottomColor)
      Changes the colors of the background gradient.
      Parameters:
      topColor - The color displayed on top of the screen
      bottomColor - The color displayed on the bottom of the screen
